distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for rubygem-kramdown fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-14001: Fixed processing template options inside documents allowing unintended read access or embedded Ruby code execution (bsc#1174297).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The kramdown gem before 2.3.0 for Ruby processes the template option inside Kramdown documents by default, which allows unintended read access (such as template="/etc/passwd") or unintended embedded Ruby code execution (such as a string that begins with template="string://<%= `). NOTE: kramdown is used in Jekyll, GitLab Pages, GitHub Pages, and Thredded Forum.
notes.title: CVE description
